template.description:
This workflow is the combined annotation of dementia & non-dementia documents.
Extra logging has been added: files from retry/failure are written to an ES index.
An extra processor (Replace text) has also been added to remove the No Break Space unicode character, because of which files were stuck in the medcat retry queue.
template.name: Combined_annotation_dementia

labels.label:
This workflow is the combined annotation of dementia & non-dementia documents.
Extra logging has been added: files from retry/failure are written to an ES index.
An extra processor (Replace text) has also been added to remove the No Break Space unicode character, because of which files were stuck in the medcat retry queue.

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute
